message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
I'm willing to give you a little more, Bob, but I still think we should be closer to a 50/50 split. What do you think?
Come on, I'm starting to feel the pinch of inflation here. Can't we meet in the middle... of my side?
Okay, Bob, I'm getting a little tired of this back and forth. Let's just get this done. I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal than last time. How about this?
